results.content: * Bessemer Venture Partners, located in Redwood City (United States), made their first investment in Abridge Inc on Oct 06, 2020 in its Series A round. * CVS Health, located in Woonsocket (United States), made their first investment in Abridge Inc on Oct 26, 2023 in its Series B round. * Kaiser Permanente Ventures, located in Oakland (United States), made their first investment in Abridge Inc on Oct 26, 2023 in its Series B round. * Lightspeed Venture Partners, located in Menlo Park (United States), made their first investment in Abridge Inc on Feb 22, 2024 in its Series C round. * Spark Capital, located in San Francisco (United States), made their first investment in Abridge Inc on Oct 26, 2023 in its Series B round.
